user_question: Can you provide a detailed meditation guide for beginners and generate an image of a serene meditation scene?
final_answer: Meditation guide for beginners: 1) Find a quiet and comfortable place. 2) Sit in a comfortable position. 3) Close your eyes gently. 4) Focus on your breath. 5) If your mind wanders, gently bring your focus back to your breath. 6) Start with 5 minutes and gradually increase the time. Image of a serene meditation scene generated. Recommended ambient music: 'Weightless' by Marconi Union, 'Ambient 1: Music for Airports' by Brian Eno, 'Deep Focus' playlist on Spotify.
